siren.name: Is that... Singing?
siren.description: The whistling of the ocean breeze carries a haunting melody. After a moment, the lookout spots a small islet port-ward.

options.text: Stay the course and put the wail out of your mind

result.text: The crew mutters at their work and tempers are high until the wailing falls out of earshot
The sun falls below the horizon before the dinghy makes it back to the ship. The crew is gone, in their place a bright white bird's skull scoured clean by the salt water.
